panels.content:
# TSO

1. PUMP GC TSO < PUMP max commit TSO 
2. PUMP GC TSO < Drainer Pull PUMP handle TSO
3. PUMP GC TSO < Draienr checkpoint TSO

## alert

1. drainer checkpoint tso no change for 1m
2. drainer checkpoint tso delay > 1 hour
3. PUMP disk space <= 10G


### read more: https://docs.pingcap.com/zh/tidb/stable/tidb-binlog-overview
panels.title: Tips

alert.message: PUMP The disk space is less than 10G
alert.name: PUMP disk space <= 10G

panels.title: Pull Binlog QPS by  Pump NodeID
